Description.Name: Permanent Contract for Hunchback Airdrop
Description.Details: Thanks to the mech's common status, this is a permanent contract offer for use of a Hunchback HBK-4G. Purchasing this contract will permit the airdrop of a Hunchback HBK-4G when using a BattleMech Airdrop Beacon. This contract is permanent and does not expire. Hold Shift when deploying the airdrop ability to select a specific unit from among those available!
